name: HM Aerospace
about: HM Aerospace Sdn Bhd (HMA) is Malaysia’s Premier Flight Training Academy, providing world-class training and facilities for cadet pilots since 2005. Located in Langkawi, next to the Langkawi International Airport, HMA benefits from the island's ideal sunny weather and serene environment. As a member of the Halim Mazmin Group, HMA trains a minimum of 200 cadet pilots annually and is a founding member of the CAE Global Academy, leveraging CAE’s global training network. HMA’s instructors are highly experienced, including Qualified Flying Instructors and former airline pilots. The academy has trained nearly 1300 commercial pilots placed in various airlines globally. HMA offers comprehensive training, including Commercial Pilot Licenses and Diplomas in Aviation, with financing solutions available. With its rich history and commitment to excellence, HMA is the gateway to a successful aviation career.
services:
["DIPLOMA IN AVIATION + CPL/IR WITH FROZEN ATPL
PRIVATE PILOT LICENSE (PPL)
ABRIDGE COURSE
ASSISTANT FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR ( AFI )"]
